results.definition: catch in or as if in a trap
something (often something deceptively attractive) that catches you unawares
examples: it was all a snare and delusion

results.definition: a trap for birds or small mammals; often has a slip noose

examples: The car salesman had snared three potential customers

results.definition: a small drum with two heads and a snare stretched across the lower head
a surgical instrument consisting of wire hoop that can be drawn tight around the base of polyps or small tumors to sever them; used especially in body cavities
strings stretched across the lower head of a snare drum; they make a rattling sound when the drum is hit
